trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_SEQ_00<tab>U'rahtalo would confide in you about her troubles.

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_SEQ_01<tab>While happily unburdened by modesty, the U tribeswomen still expect their daily ablutions in the springs to not serve as a local attraction. Confront all the unwanted onlookers with /furious indignation.

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_SEQ_02<tab>Your righteous indignation has caused the oglers to flee for their lives. Anger is a gift, and it seems that the Twelve have been generous with your share. Make pleasant your countenance, and report the happy news to U'rahtalo.

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_SEQ_03<tab>U'rahtalo is well glad to be free of the madding crowd. However, it seems that she was not <var 1A 02 /var>completely<var 1A 01 /var> averse to the attention she was being offered.
TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_TODO_00<tab>Confront the oglers with a /furious anger.
TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_TODO_01<tab>Report to U'rahtalo.

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_URAHTALO_000_000<tab>Have I got a job for <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, adventurer! You'll be positively perfect. You <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> look dangerous, can't you?

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_URAHTALO_000_001<tab>My sisters and I like to bathe here after a hunt, but lately, there have been oglers about. I've leapt out of the water to chase them off, but this only seems to swell their ranks! Will you chase them down and show them how <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>furious<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> I am?
TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPA_000_010<tab>Away with you! Can't you see I'm trying to focus here? Sheesh.

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPA_000_015<tab>Ahhh! I'm sorry, <var 08 E905 ((m-m-madam)) ((s-s-sir)) /var>! No need to get angry, now! I-I have a problem, all right!? I was working it out with my mummy, and─uh, er, ah...
TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPB_000_020<tab>Now <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> is what I call nubile, mmm, mmm, <var 1A 02 /var>mmmmmm<var 1A 01 /var>...
TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPB_000_025<tab>Wh-Whoa, there! I-I'll never peep, I swear it by the Twelve! Gods, I'll see that look of fury in <var 1A 02 /var>nightmares<var 1A 01 /var>... <shudder>

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPC_000_030<tab>These proportions...pure perfection! I must painstakingly record how the <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((moonlight)) ((sunlight)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((sunlight)) ((moonlight)) /var>)) /var> radiates off her skin...

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPC_000_035<tab>Uh-oh... Uh... N-No need to get angry, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! I was j-just measuring these, um, trees! Yes, these trees. Rather odd looking, eh!? Only doing my bit for science!
TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPD_000_040<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Ahhhhhh<var 1A 01 /var>... The swaying trees, the peaceful water...the stunning, comely maidens...
TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPD_000_045<tab>Wh-What!? I said I liked the trees, too! It's not like...I'm only here...for the girls...

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPE_000_050<tab>Oi, ye ain't got nothin' against a workin' man takin' a break from the heat, do ye? 'Course ye don't! But speakin' of heat, take a gander jus' over there, eh? <var 1A 02 /var>Eh<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPE_000_055<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Oh<var 1A 01 /var>, er, can't say as though I meant to offend ye, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Uh! W-Well, I'll be goin'!

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPF_000_060<tab>Mine eyes are dazzled by how they shine! I am as one turned to stone. Those fair Miqo'te must be thaumaturges. Or conjurers. Or those other mages─the ones with the books!

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_PEEPF_000_065<tab>Oh...oh, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>... I... I have been tested and found most wanting. So easily was I blinded, trussed, and enfeebled. I must rise above these base impulses if I am to amount to anything!

TEXT_GAIUSB109_00828_URAHTALO_000_080<tab>Ah, marvelous! Not an ogler in sight! You have my gratitude, adventurer. Though...having a good look at you...I suppose I wouldn't mind if <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> stole a peek now and then.<var 08 E905 (( Bet you didn't think my tastes ran that way, hmmm?)) (()) /var>
